comments.body: Actually, I realized that I don't understand why you are removing this init() function. Can you please explain? [What you did seems more complicated.]
@wojtek-t replied below... removing `init()` so that `t.Skip(..)` works.  The broader reason to remove it is in the comment below.
// TODO: Instead of sprinkling calls to this throughout the code, adjust the prefix in etcdtest package; then just delete everything once at the end of the test run.
